title: Vijay Kumar P. at University of Southern California | Rate My Professors
meta_description: Vijay Kumar P.  is a professor in the Engineering department at University of Southern California - see what their students are saying about them or leave a rating yourself.

It was so moving that Prof. Kumar recorded lecture videos and held several online OH in COVID-19 term. The course goes much more tough in the last several weeks. 3 midterms and 1 final is heavy but a nice setting for students to learn.
